text: == Events == * The Sixth Crusade is launched by Frederick II, Holy Roman Emperor, after delays due to sickness and an excommunication from Pope Gregory IX. * Conrad IV of Germany becomes titular King of Jerusalem, with Frederick II as regent. * Baldwin II becomes emperor of the Latin Empire in Constantinople, with John of Brienne as regent. * Amadeus IV becomes count of Savoy. * Francis of Assisi founder of the Franciscan order Canonized by Pope Gregory IX * Sukaphaa, the first Ahom king, establishes his rule in Assam. The Ahom kings reigned for close to 600 years. * First mention of the Transylvanian town of Reghin, in a charter of Andrew II of Hungary.
